title: Tony Hillerman Book Sales
description: An interactive horizontal bar chart showing estimated total sales for each of Tony Hillerman's Leaphorn & Chee novels.
subject: Mathematics
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of tony hillerman book sales
Apply tony hillerman book sales to solve problems
Visualize and interpret tony hillerman book sales relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on tony hillerman book sales
